What are the treatments for pilomatricoma ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of pilomatricoma:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Pilomatrixoma   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,
